context.description: Quick Start - Start from scratch wizard Use this wizard to create the basic resources that are required to develop an Integration application. You can create a message flow project, a message set project, set up the project dependency, create a message set and, optionally, create a message flow and working set.

topic.label: Getting started with Quick Start wizards

context.description: Quick Start - Start from WSDL and/or XSD wizard Use this wizard to create a new application that is based on existing WSDL or XSD files.

topic.label: Getting started with Quick Start wizards
Creating an application based on WSDL or XSD files

context.description: Quick Start - Start from existing message set wizard Before using this wizard you must first have created a message set. Use the wizard to create a new application that is based on an existing message set.

topic.label: Getting started with Quick Start wizards
Creating an application based on an existing message set

context.description: Quick Start - Start from an adapter connection wizard Use this wizard to create an application that uses WebSphere Adapters.

topic.label: Getting started with Quick Start wizards
Creating an application using WebSphere Adapters
Developing message flow applications using WebSphere Adapters
